test.create_query: CREATE TABLE keys (key UInt64) ENGINE = MergeTree ORDER BY key;
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO keys SELECT rand() FROM numbers(10000000);
test.query: SELECT keys.key, value1 FROM keys ANY LEFT JOIN dict AS d ON (keys.key = d.key) FORMAT Null;
SELECT keys.key, value1 FROM keys ANY LEFT JOIN dict AS d ON (keys.key = d.key) FORMAT Null SETTINGS allow_experimental_analyzer=1
